sentences.en: A cold, diffuse light filtered in through the skylight.
sentences.cn: 一道冰冷的光线透过天窗漫射进来。

sentences.en: Colonic polyps in children may be solitary, multiple, or diffuse.
sentences.cn: 小儿结肠息肉可以单发, 多发或呈弥漫性.

sentences.en: Direct light is better for reading than diffuse light.
sentences.cn: 直射光比漫射光更有利于阅读.

sentences.en: Electrons in atoms are visualized as diffuse clouds surrounding the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 原子中的电子可以想像为弥漫在原子核周围的电子云.

sentences.en: Galactic nebulas are masses of diffuse material within our galaxy.
sentences.cn: 银河星云是我们星系中的一团团弥散物.

sentences.en: Heat transfer is relatively ineffective in diffuse gases.
sentences.cn: 热转移在弥漫气体中的效率比较低.

sentences.en: Hedonism and frivolity will diffuse hell tnrough all our days.
sentences.cn: 享乐主义和轻薄浮佻会将地狱扩展到我们的整个日子之中.

sentences.en: His talk was so diffuse that I missed his point.
sentences.cn: 他的谈话漫无边际,我抓不住他的要点.

sentences.en: His writing is diffuse and difficult to understand.
His writing is so diffuse and obscure that it is difficult to make out what it is he is trying to say.
sentences.cn: 他的文章含混晦涩，让人看后不知所云。

sentences.en: It allows nicotine to diffuse slowly and steadily into the bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 它能使尼古丁平稳缓慢地渗透到血液里。

sentences.en: Rayleigh scatter determines the upwelling diffuse flux which can be absorbed.
sentences.cn: Rayleigh散射决定了能被吸收的向外的漫射通量.

sentences.en: Reflection from a rough surface is often called diffuse reflection.
sentences.cn: 粗糙表面的反射常常叫做漫射.

sentences.en: Schools and libraries and many television programs diffuse knowlege.
sentences.cn: 学校、图书馆和很多电视节目都传播知识.

sentences.en: The difference between diffuse and specular density illustrated in Figure 2:2.
sentences.cn: 漫射密度与定向密度之间的区别可用图2.2来说明.

sentences.en: The organization is large and diffuse.
sentences.cn: 这个组织规模大、分布广。

sentences.en: The pollutants diffuse into the soil.
Their ideas diffused quickly across Europe.
sentences.cn: 他们的观点很快在欧洲传播开来。

words.tran_cn: 普及的；散布性的；冗长的
散布，传播（diffuse的过去分词）；使分散

phrases.tran_cn: 漫反射率；漫反射系数；护散反射率

trans.tran_cn: 分散的，弥漫的，不清楚的，冗长的

trans.tran_en: to make heat, light, liquid etc spread through something, or to spread like this
to make heat, light, liquid etc spread through something, or to spread like this
to spread ideas or information among a lot of people, or to spread like this
